Shareholder Name: Mofrh bin Abdullah Al Marzok Al Salim

Description: Wafrah for Industry and Development (known as: Wafrah) is a public company, listed on Saudi Stock Exchange “Tadawul” (TDWL) since January 1993. Wafrah operates within the Food, Beverage and Tobacco sector focusing on Packaged Foods and Meats. It has Companies operating across Saudi Arabia, working on Commodity Chemicals and Agricultural Products. Wafrah is based in Riyadh, Saudi Arabia and was established in April 1990.
Company Name: Wafrah for Industry and Development Co (2100)
